data.text: @JusticeOrDie212 Sadly it unanimously passed the senate yesterday and is headed to president! He needs to veto and send back
@Freedmen_Party That's what I'm saying..I really hope that it dies in the Senate..
@JusticeOrDie212 Also that bill is so vague it can be used against #Freedmen

@Freedmen_Party Folks are mad that some republicans voted nay but to be honest I would not voted in support of the bill either. It put a max NOT a minimum on punishment. Also, based on the wording of the bill random street drama could constitute a lynching.. https://t.co/nemAr7mFp5
@Freedmen_Party Damn shame. Is it possible to add to a bill?
And you’d think with their bill passing first @RepBobbyRush would have used more language to protect us instead of leaving us out to dry I mean die

Also to be clear this bill isn’t really for us just a carrot and stick 

30 years max? We cannot accept that
